quoteText: (Please note, when you use our Services, we may recognize you or your devices even if you are not signed in to our Services.)  Oath may use device IDs, cookies, and other signals, including information obtained from third parties, to associate accounts and/or devices with you.
title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr: "We may [...] set and access device identifiers which could include [...] user agent information (browser version, OS type and version)"
